content.description:
Paradisio is a really cool feature that is a little funky to get to. You can climb the first four bolts of

Pandemonium

, and then traverse left across the ledge to reach a belay station at the base of the route proper, or lower to it after climbing one of the routes to the right.

From the belay station, head up really cool cobbles and then into the chimney above, with some wild stemming moves. At the top, use the arete to get to the anchors which are up on the ledge.
content.location:
On the far right side of the 1st Band, look for the huge flake feature, left of the

Pandemonium

corner.

content.description: Climb up through some chossy but easy ground to reach the first bolt, then go up the corner with mostly moderate climbing and a brief but funky crux in the middle. At the last bolt, stay low and traverse left to get to the anchor.
content.protection:
12 bolts. This shares an anchor with

Meaty, Beaty, Big, and Bouncy

.
content.location: On the far right side of the First Band is a large corner feature, the route goes up this.

content.description: Start with some difficult/funky moves getting past the wide crack at the start, then follow mellow climbing up a shallow, left-facing corner to a crux when you exit the corner. Get past this, and enjoy the beautifully textured stone leading to the chains.
content.protection:
12 bolts. This shares an anchor with

Pandemonium

.
content.location:
On the far right side of the 1st Band, just left of the major corner feature of

Pandemonium

, look for a wide crack.
